craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 30% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 10 bonus Ability Power.

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex(es) in the same row gain a shield that blocks the damage and effects of the first enemy Ability, up to 600 damage.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Physical damage heals the holder for 33% of the damage dealt. Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 30% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
The holder gains 50 Starting Mana (including components). After casting their Ability, the holder gains 20 mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Grants 70 bonus Armor (including components). Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Grants 200 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from a casted Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 18% of their maximum Health (0.5 second cooldown).

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 30%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1800 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 60%.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder first drops below 60% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding damage and negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains an additional 40% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
The holder gains both of the following:
- +10 Attack Damage and +10 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 10% of damage dealt.

At the beginning of each planning phase, one of these buffs is increased to 33(%).

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest Health ally for the same amount.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 200% of their maximum Mana.

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 
300/350/400★ damage for 15 seconds.

craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 50/75/100★ bonus Attack Damage (including components).

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: During combat, the holder gains 25 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 10% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
The holder gains 20% bonus Attack Speed. The holder is immune to crowd control in combat for 15 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Grants 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs: Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 55% bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 18% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 10 Attack Damage. The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the holder's Attack Damage as physical damage.

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first cast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: The holder's attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 10% bonus Attack Speed. Every 3rd attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 60 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 16% of their maximum Health as true damage over 8 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equip 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain 30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores crowd control immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Socialite trait.

embl.name: VanguardsCuirass
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Debonair trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: WarlordsBanner
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Chemtech trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: YoumuusGhostblade
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Assassin trait.

embl.name: SyndicateEmblem

radi.add_attrs: At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the holder dies, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus stats arises taunting nearby enemies. Radiant Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer executes enemies below 10% health on-hit. Executions generate 1 gold 60% of the time.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemRanduinsOmen
arti.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain 50 bonus armor and 50 bonus magic resistance for the rest of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemBlackCleaver
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer's basic attacks and spell damage shred enemy armor and magic resistance by 60% for 3 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemSpiritVisage
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer regenerates 6% of their maximum health each second.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs:
Armor +30, Attack Damage +30, Attack Speed +30%, Crit Chance +30%, Health +30, Magic Resist +30, Ability Power +30%

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemRocketPropelledFist
arti.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, the wearer Airborne pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, Stun stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy. (Always targets a different unit than Blitzcrank)

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemEverfrost
arti.add_attrs:
Enemies who damage the holder have their Attack Speed slowed by 30% for 2 seconds. After being slowed this way 7 times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemZhonyasHourglass
arti.add_attrs:
The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below 40% health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
70% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 5 seconds as non-lethal damage. The holder's Attacks and Abilities also heal for 20% of damage dealt.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore 150 mana over 4 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
